verses.name: Luke 12:29
verses.text: And seek not ye what ye shall eat, or what ye shall drink, neither be ye of doubtful mind.

verses.name: Luke 12:30
verses.text: For all these things do the nations of the world seek after: and your Father knoweth that ye have need of these things.

verses.name: Luke 12:31
verses.text: But rather seek ye the kingdom of God; and all these things shall be added unto you.

verses.name: Luke 12:32
verses.text: Fear not, little flock; for it is your Father’s good pleasure to give you the kingdom.
